'''1.19.3 Release Candidate 3''' (known as '''1.19.3-rc3''' in the launcher) is the third and final release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.19.3]], released on December 6, 2022,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-19-3-release-candidate-3|Minecraft 1.19.3 Release Candidate 3|December 6, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs. This is the final release candidate released in 2022.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.19.3 Release Candidate 3
|;From released versions before 1.19
|108707|Potion effects, particles, and fire animations persist client-side after death in server environments.
|;From 1.19.2
|258279|Particle groups aren't cleared on resource reload.
|;dev
|258258|The <code>EntityTag</code> NBT data on armor stands is no longer applied upon placement.
}}</onlyinclude>
